Detailed Description

Tokenizer/Lexer parameters.

Struct used to pass parameters to the tokenizer/lexer.

See also:
gtokenize.h::gNewParms, gtokenize.h::gFreeParms

Field Documentation

char* comment1s

Start string of fist comment type (default: "//").

Comments: The tokenizer supports up to two comment styles. Each specified by the strings. commentXs is the marker denoting the beginning of a comment (eg. //) and commentXe is the marker denoting the end (eg. line-end). These strings are never modified so it's safe to assign string constants to them.

int flags

parser flags (defaults: 0)

See also:
gParseFlags_e
